product_page_short_description: Processor: Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6MB Cache, 3.00 GHz, up to 4.10 GHz)
full_description:
HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop

The HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 laptop is powered by the Intel Core i3-1115G4 Processor (6MB Cache, 3.00 GHz, up to 4.10 GHz) and 8GB LPDDR4X RAM. It is equipped with a 256GB NVMe PCle SSD. The laptop is integrated with Intel UHD Graphics and it has a 15.6” FHD IPS Display. It offers a 45%NTSC Colours Gamut and 250 nits brightness. The laptop has an 87% screen-to-body ratio with an aspect ratio of 16:9. It can deliver a viewing angle of 170 degrees. The whole system is powered by a 42 Wh lithium polymer battery. The HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 comes with a full-size keyboard and a touchpad with multi-touch functionality. It has an HD webcam with dual speakers and dual-integrated microphones.

Live and Work on the Cutting-Edge

The Intel Core i3-1115G4 is a dual-core SoC for laptops. It includes 4 threads and two Willow Cove processor cores. Each core has a clock range of 3.1 GHz to 4.1 GHz (single- and dual-core boost). It has Xe graphics built in. The 12 architecture is used to construct the CPU. The chip is manufactured using the second-generation Intel SuperFin 10 nm process, which ought to be competitive with the TSMC 7 nm process.

Fingerprint Power Button

The HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 features a 2-in-1 Fingerprint Power Button. It is a signature feature of HUAWEI MateBook laptops. It is very convenient and safe at the same time. It takes less time to access your desktop than typing a password. It also adds extra security.

Secure Pop-up Webcam

The MateBook B3-520 has a unique and secure pop-up camera. It can deliver 720P resolution. The camera is activated only by touch. It ensures your privacy and provides you with hardware-level security. So that you are in control of your privacy safeguards.

Buy HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop from the best Laptop Shop in BD

The HUAWEI MateBook B3-520 Laptop comes with 2 years of warranty.

full_description:
Huawei MateBook D15 Core i5 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop

The Huawei MateBook D15 comes with Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor (8M Cache, 2.40 GHz up to 4.20 GHz) and 8GB DDR4 RAM. The 11th Gen Intel Core processor makes everything that much faster, so you spend less time waiting and more time doing. This laptop comes equipped with a 512 GB NVMe PCle SSD. It has been integrated with Intel Iris Xe Graphics and it comes with an IPS 15.6" HUAWEI FullView Display. The display offers Full-HD 1920 x 1080 resolution that lets every image burst with detail and clarity, while the 16:9 aspect ratio stretches the limits of what you can see. It is designed to relieve eye strain and vision fatigue, with Flicker-Free and Reduced Blue Light certifications from TÃœV Rheinland. The Huawei MateBook D15 is slimmed down to a super-narrow 5.3 mm. The Huawei MateBook D15 comes with a Full-size keyboard with Touchpad. It features 720P HD Recessed Camera and comes with 2 x Speaker (2 W) and 2 x Microphone. This laptop features Fingerprint Power Button for maximum security. It offers WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 for Network & Wireless Connectivity. It supports 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz, 2 x 2 MIMO, WPA/WPA2/WPA3. The laptop has been designed with USB 3.2 Gen1 x 1, USB 2.0 x 2, USB-C x 1, HDMI x 1 and 3.5 mm headset and microphone 2-in-1 jack x 1. The Huawei MateBook D15 comes with 2 Years Warranty (Battery & Adapter 1 Year).
